DOC.brief_summary: The first aim investigator study , investigate combine effect diet , physical exercise orlistat , 24 week , serum Anti-Müllerian Hormone ( AMH ) level obese woman polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) obese control . The aim investigator study , examine effect hypocaloric diet , physical exercise plus sibutramine serum AMH level , body composition , hormonal metabolic parameter overweight obese patient polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Weight Loss Anti-Müllerian Hormone Levels Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS )
DOC.detailed_description: The first aim study , investigate combine effect diet , physical exercise orlistat , 24 week , serum Anti-Müllerian Hormone ( AMH ) level obese woman polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) obese control . The study include sixty one ( 61 ) woman PCOS ( mean age : 26.11±6.86 mean body mass index : 34.83±6.39 ) , match age body mass index ( BMI ) twenty ( 20 ) obese woman without PCOS ( mean age : 26.95±4.77 mean BMI : 36.79±6.98 ) . Diagnosis PCOS base 2003 Rotterdam ESHRE/ASRM-Sponsored PCOS Consensus criterion . Briefly , moderate daily physical activity normal-protein , energy restrict diet prescribed base calculated individual basal metabolic rate ( BMR ) woman ( BMR-600 kcal/d ) , period 24 week . In addition , orlistat ( Xenical , Roche S.A. , Greece ; 120 mg , 3 time per day ) administer meal , 24 week . At baseline , week 12 , week 24 , 9:00 AM , overnight fast , subject weigh . Waist hip circumference measure duplicate . Blood sample collect basal serum level AMH , FSH , LH , PRL , T , D4A , DHEAS , 17a-hydroxyprogesterone ( 17a-OHP ) , SHBG , glucose , insulin measure . AMH concentration measure enzymatically amplify two-sided immunoassay [ DSL-10-14400 Active Müllerian Inhibiting Substance/AMH enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay ( ELISA ) kit , DSL Laboratories , Webster , TX ] . The theoretical sensitivity method 0.006 ng/ml , intra-assay coefficient variation high value 3.3 % interassay coefficient variation high value 6.7 % . We also study change mean number follicle ( express mean number follicle ovaries= follicle right ovary+ follicle leave ovary/2 ) mean ovarian volume ( expressed mean volume ovaries= volume right ovary+ volume leave ovary/2 ) . The aim study , examine effect hypocaloric diet , physical exercise plus sibutramine serum AMH level , body composition , hormonal metabolic parameter overweight obese patient polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) . Outpatients , premenopausal , nonpregnant , nonlactating , overweight obese woman ( body mass index , BMI > 27 ) , 18 year age old PCOS recruit study . The study include fifty seven ( 57 ) woman PCOS ( mean age : 26.11±6.86 mean body mass index : 34.83±6.39 ) , besides diet exercise , receive Sibutramine treatment , match age body mass index ( BMI ) nineteen ( 19 ) obese woman PCOS ( mean age : 26.95±4.77 mean BMI : 36.79±6.98 ) treat diet exercise . Diagnosis PCOS base 2003 Rotterdam ESHRE/ASRM-Sponsored PCOS Consensus criterion . Women classical 21-hydroxylase deficiency , hyperprolactinemia , adrenal ovarian tumor Cushing 's disease exclude appropriate test . Other exclusion criterion hypertension , thyroid dysfunction , overt diabetes mellitus concomitant treatment , antihypertensive drug , selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor SNRI drug , oral contraceptive pill antiandrogen treatment ( cyproterone acetate , spirolactone , luteinizing hormone ( LH ) release hormone agonist ) insulin-sensitizing agent ( metformin , pioglitazone , rosiglitazone ) may interact insulin sensitivity lipid profile . Briefly , patient place hypocaloric diet plus sibutramine ( 10mg per day ) first month hypocaloric diet plus sibutramine ( 10mg per day ) hypocaloric diet subsequent 6 month . A moderate physical activity ( 3 hour per week ) normal-protein , energy restrict diet prescribed base calculated individual basal metabolic rate ( BMR ) woman ( BMR-600 kcal/d ) , period 24 week . At baseline , week 12 , week 24 , 9:00 AM , overnight fast , subject weigh . Waist hip circumference measure duplicate . Blood sample collect basal serum level AMH , FSH , LH , PRL , T , D4A , DHEAS , 17a-hydroxyprogesterone ( 17a-OHP ) , SHBG , glucose , insulin measure . AMH concentration measure enzymatically amplify two-sided immunoassay [ DSL-10-14400 Active Müllerian Inhibiting Substance/AMH enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay ( ELISA ) kit , DSL Laboratories , Webster , TX ] .
DOC.criteria: premenopausal , nonpregnant , nonlactating , overweight obese woman classical 21hydroxylase deficiency , hyperprolactinemia , adrenal ovarian tumor Cushing 's disease
